mapper.select: SELECT s.id as solutionId, s.title, u.name as userName, s.summary, s.runtime, s.memory, p.name AS languageName, s.content CASE WHEN b.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as isBookmarked FROM algorithm_problem_solution s INNER JOIN user u ON s.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN programming_language p ON s.language_id = p.id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON b.content_id = s.id AND b.content_type = 'algo_solution' AND b.user_id = #{userId} WHERE s.id = #{solutionId} AND s.is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO algorithm_problem_solution ( problem_id, title, summary, content, user_id, runtime, memory, language_id, generation_id, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{problemId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{runtime}, #{memory}, #{languageId}, #{generationId}, NOW(), NOW(), false )
mapper.update: UPDATE algorithm_problem_solution SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, runtime = #{runtime}, memory = #{memory}, language_id = #{languageId}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{solutionId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = false
UPDATE algorithm_problem_solution SET is_deleted = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{solutionId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = false
